Usage: PROGRAM NAME UNKNOWN -param2=... ...

===============

common.params-help       [ 9 parameters, 8 hidden ]
      [-help] or [-usage]
---------------
test-group1              [ 6 parameters, 1 hidden ]
      [-param1=...] or [-param1-alt1=...]
      -param2=... or -param2-alt2=...
      [-param4[=...]]
      [-param5=...]
      [-param6=...]
